plugins.name: interaction-recorder
plugins.description: Record polished demo videos of any codebase's UI with narration, sound design, and motion graphics. Uses Playwright for browser automation, Remotion for video compositing, and supports TTS, image generation, and sound design.

plugins.name: skill-best-practices
plugins.description: Comprehensive guide for building Claude Code skills and plugins. Teaches best practices and interactively scaffolds new skills with /create-skill.

plugins.name: image-gen
plugins.description: Generate, edit, and enhance images using FAL AI models. Supports text-to-image, image-to-image editing, and upscaling with intelligent model selection across Imagen 4, Grok Imagine, Seedream, Nano Banana, FLUX.2, and more.

plugins.name: visual-documentation
plugins.description: Create visual documentation: architecture diagrams (HTML/Mermaid/DOT), flowcharts (HTML/Mermaid/DOT), lo-fi wireframe mockups, HTML technical docs with syntax highlighting, and project timelines/Gantt charts/roadmaps.
